Set PCCTC gtsummary theme

Source: R/theme_gtsummary_pcctc.R
theme_gtsummary_pcctc.Rd

Visit the gtsummary themes vignette for a full list of preferences that can be set.

Usage

theme_gtsummary_pcctc(font_size = NULL)

Arguments

font_size

(scaler numeric)
Numeric font size for compact theme. Default is 13 for gt tables, and 8 for all other output types

Examples

theme_gtsummary_pcctc()
#> Setting theme "PCCTC"
